author: jdcasey
msg: Resolving: MNG-823...added context-awareness to AbstractMojo, using ContextEnabled interface to avoid breaking Mojo API for direct implementors. Added two mojos in the core-it plugin to use the plugin context map, and an IT - it0073 - to test the whole thing.
